title: Rebuild our home, say no to mutual destruction

replies.msg: Not only did the rioters destroy Hong Kong’s law and order and disrupt social harmony, but they have also caused incalculable damage to public facilities and commercial establishments.  They callously wield violence to threaten the physical safety of the general public and mute those who hold different opinions. Besides freedom of speech, personal liberty itself was snuffed out under their mob rule, which dragged down the economy and severely affected the livelihoods of the general public.
